analysis.description:
Reentrancy in BTHRTokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0xc0744398121ce2209e4d130671ae9910343b08ea.sol#506-537):
	External calls:
	- newTokens = addBonusTokens(token.totalSupply(),newTokens) (/unique_chucks/6/0xc0744398121ce2209e4d130671ae9910343b08ea.sol#526-527)
	- tokensWouldAddTo = newTokens.add(token.totalSupply()) (/unique_chucks/6/0xc0744398121ce2209e4d130671ae9910343b08ea.sol#527-528)
	- token.mint(_buyer,newTokens) (/unique_chucks/6/0xc0744398121ce2209e4d130671ae9910343b08ea.sol#529)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- weiRaised (/unique_chucks/6/0xc0744398121ce2209e4d130671ae9910343b08ea.sol#533)

BTHRTokenSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/6/0xc0744398121ce2209e4d130671ae9910343b08ea.sol#506-537) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(_buyer,newTokens) (/unique_chucks/6/0xc0744398121ce2209e4d130671ae9910343b08ea.sol#529)

BTHRTokenSale.finalization (/unique_chucks/6/0xc0744398121ce2209e4d130671ae9910343b08ea.sol) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.mint(wallet,toMint) (/unique_chucks/6/0xc0744398121ce2209e4d130671ae9910343b08ea.sol)
	-token.finishMinting() (/unique_chucks/6/0xc0744398121ce2209e4d130671ae9910343b08ea.sol)
